content.body: sffc: Monday afternoon meetup sounds good.

How are people feeling about putting Amount up again for Stage 2? Are we waiting on anything in particular?

(If we're waiting on the Google position, I'm still working on it, but I don't expect it to be significantly different from the one in September: the type needs to be designed to encourage string formatting and discourage round-trip conversion to numbers)

I just put together a proposal for the Intl unit protocol, since multiple delegates have observed that it is separable from Amount, and since it is a prerequisite for Amount due to polyfills and proxies, and since it might be easier to get consensus to advance. Would you like to add this to the agenda?

https://github.com/sffc/proposal-intl-unit-protocol/

* I just put together a proposal for the Intl unit protocol, since multiple delegates have observed that it is separable from Amount, and since it is a prerequisite for Amount due to polyfills and proxies, and since it might be easier to get consensus to advance. Do you think I should add this to the agenda?

https://github.com/sffc/proposal-intl-unit-protocol/

content.body: the only blocker I was aware of is unblocked
